entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with drizzle early this evening and ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
